definition: see 打火機|打火机[da3 huo3 ji1]
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86

sentences.english: Use a lighter to burn a hole in the middle of each Scindapsus aureus leaf.
sentences.chinese: 把一盆綠蘿的葉子中央都用打火機燒一個洞。

sentences.english: There are plenty of extras, including a cigarette-lighter adapter.
sentences.chinese: 有很多羣衆演員，包括香菸打火機適配器。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a flame welding gun, which belongs to the class of tools.
sentences.chinese: 本實用新型涉及一種火機焊槍，屬於工具類。

sentences.english: I don't have a lighter because I only happen to smoke O. P. B.
sentences.chinese: 我沒有打火機，因爲我只是偶爾抽他人的香菸。

sentences.english: Would you have made me quit smokin’ by finding one of my lighters?
sentences.chinese: 你能否沒收我的打火機，讓我把煙戒掉？

sentences.english: How did I manage to walk away from a Chinese tea party 853 yuan lighter?
sentences.chinese: 我如何管理自己步行一中茶話會八五三元打火機了？

sentences.english: Do not strike matches or lighters, try to avoid coughing whilst your opponent is at the table.
sentences.chinese: 當你的對手在臺面擊球時，不能劃火柴或點燃打火機。

sentences.english: My lighter are flaxen and transparent.
sentences.chinese: 我的打火機是淡黃色的和透明的。

sentences.english: The owner's name marked on this cigarette lighter has been filed away by the thief.
sentences.chinese: 主人刻在打火機上的姓名被小偷用銼刀銼掉了。

sentences.english: Where Zao Zhuang has selling the butane that cigarette lighter uses's.
sentences.chinese: 棗莊哪裏有賣打火機用的丁烷氣的。

sentences.english: Highlighting with a shimmery product that is a few shades lighter.
sentences.chinese: 突出與是一些片樹蔭打火機的一個微微發亮產品。

sentences.english: I gave him a lighter as his Christmas present with 7 letters.
sentences.chinese: 我送給他一支火機作爲聖誕禮物，還有7封信。

sentences.english: Use matches instead of plastic-encased lighters.
sentences.chinese: 用火柴，不要用塑料殼的打火機。

sentences.english: Get a lighter and a candle with a cotton wick.
sentences.chinese: 取一個打火機和一支有棉花芯的蠟燭。

sentences.english: The cigarette lighter view of the human mortality.
sentences.chinese: 以打火機的想法看待人類死亡。

sentences.english: He has just waltzed off with my cigarette lighter.
sentences.chinese: 他剛纔把我的打火機偷走了。

definition: ring pull (can)/strap handle (on bus or train)/circular door handle
ballpoint pen/also written 圓珠筆|圆珠笔
